title: Awesome List Updates on May 06, 2025
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on May 06, 2025 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Testing
items.content_text:
### Software / API Testing

*   [Tests Coverage Tool (⭐8)](https://github.com/Nikita-Filonov/tests-coverage-tool) - Ultimate tool to measure gRPC service coverage from tests.
*   [Swagger Coverage Tool (⭐8)](https://github.com/Nikita-Filonov/swagger-coverage-tool) - The Swagger Coverage Tool is designed to measure API test coverage based on Swagger documentation. It provides automated tracking and reporting of test coverage for APIs, helping ensure that your endpoints and services are well-tested.

### Software / UI & End-to-End Testing

*   [UI Coverage Tool (⭐4)](https://github.com/Nikita-Filonov/ui-coverage-scenario-tool) - UI Coverage Tool is an innovative, no-overhead solution for tracking and visualizing UI test coverage — directly on your actual application, not static snapshots.

### Software / Performance & Load Testing

*   [Load Testing Hub Panel (⭐18)](https://github.com/Nikita-Filonov/load-testing-hub-panel) - Ultimate web UI for visualizing load test results
items.content_html:
Software / API Testing

  • Tests Coverage Tool (⭐8) - Ultimate tool to measure gRPC service coverage from tests.
  • Swagger Coverage Tool (⭐8) - The Swagger Coverage Tool is designed to measure API test coverage based on Swagger documentation. It provides automated tracking and reporting of test coverage for APIs, helping ensure that your endpoints and services are well-tested.

Software / UI & End-to-End Testing

  • UI Coverage Tool (⭐4) - UI Coverage Tool is an innovative, no-overhead solution for tracking and visualizing UI test coverage — directly on your actual application, not static snapshots.

Software / Performance & Load Testing

  • Load Testing Hub Panel (⭐18) - Ultimate web UI for visualizing load test results

items.title: Awesome Selfhosted
items.content_text:
### Software / Archiving and Digital Preservation (DP)

*   [LiveStreamDVR (⭐400)](https://github.com/MrBrax/LiveStreamDVR) `⚠` - Automatic Twitch recorder capable of capturing live streams, chat messages and stream metadata. `MIT` `Python/Nodejs/Docker`

### Software / Automation

*   [LazyLibrarian](https://gitlab.com/LazyLibrarian/LazyLibrarian) `⚠` - Follow authors and grab metadata for all your digital reading needs. It uses a combination of Goodreads, Librarything and optionally GoogleBooks as sources for author info and book info. `GPL-3.0` `Python`
*   [Leon](https://getleon.ai) - Personal assistant who can live on your server. ([Source Code (⭐16k)](https://github.com/leon-ai/leon)) `MIT` `Nodejs`
*   [OliveTin](https://www.olivetin.app/) - Web interface for running Linux shell commands. ([Source Code (⭐3.1k)](https://github.com/OliveTin/OliveTin)) `AGPL-3.0` `Go`

### Software / Blogging Platforms

*   [Known](https://withknown.com/) - Collaborative social publishing platform. ([Source Code (⭐1.1k)](https://github.com/idno/known)) `Apache-2.0` `PHP`

### Software / Bookmarks and Link Sharing

*   [LinkAce](https://www.linkace.org/) - Bookmark archive with automatic backups to the Internet Archive, link monitoring, and a full REST API. Installation is done via Docker, or as a simple PHP application. ([Demo](https://demo.linkace.org/guest/links), [Source Code (⭐3k)](https://github.com/Kovah/LinkAce/)) `GPL-3.0` `Docker/PHP`
*   [linkding](https://linkding.link/) - Minimal bookmark management with a fast and clean UI. Simple installation through Docker and can run on your Raspberry Pi. ([Demo](https://demo.linkding.link/login/), [Source Code (⭐8.6k)](https://github.com/sissbruecker/linkding)) `MIT` `Docker`
*   [LinkWarden](https://linkwarden.app/) - Bookmark and archive manager to store your useful links. ([Source Code (⭐13k)](https://github.com/linkwarden/linkwarden)) `MIT` `Docker/Nodejs`
*   [NeonLink (⭐356)](https://github.com/AlexSciFier/neonlink) - Bookmark service with unique design and simple installation with Docker. `MIT` `Docker`

### Software / Communication - Custom Communication Systems

*   [Jami](https://jami.net/) - Universal communication platform which preserves the user's privacy and freedoms. ([Source Code](https://git.jami.net/savoirfairelinux?sort=latest_activity_desc\&filter=jami)) `GPL-3.0` `C++`
*   [Novu](https://novu.co/) - Notification infrastructure for developers. ([Source Code (⭐37k)](https://github.com/novuhq/novu/)) `MIT` `Docker/Nodejs`

### Software / Communication - Email - Mailing Lists and Newsletters

*   [Keila](https://www.keila.io) - Reliable and easy-to-use newsletter tool (alternative to Mailchimp or Sendinblue). ([Demo](https://app.keila.io), [Source Code (⭐1.7k)](https://github.com/pentacent/keila)) `AGPL-3.0` `Docker`

### Software / Communication - IRC

*   [ngircd](https://ngircd.barton.de/) - Portable and lightweight Internet Relay Chat server for small or private networks. ([Source Code (⭐484)](https://github.com/ngircd/ngircd)) `GPL-2.0` `C/deb`

### Software / Communication - SIP

*   [openSIPS](https://opensips.org/) - SIP proxy/server for voice, video, IM, presence and any other SIP extensions. ([Source Code (⭐1.4k)](https://github.com/OpenSIPS/opensips)) `GPL-2.0` `C`

### Software / Communication - Social Networks and Forums

*   [Lemmy](https://join-lemmy.org/) - Link aggregator for the fediverse (alternative to Reddit). ([Source Code (⭐14k)](https://github.com/LemmyNet/lemmy)) `AGPL-3.0` `Docker/Rust`
*   [Loomio](https://www.loomio.org/) - Collaborative decision-making tool that makes it easy for anyone to participate in decisions which affect them. ([Source Code (⭐2.5k)](https://github.com/loomio/loomio)) `AGPL-3.0` `Docker`
*   [NodeBB](https://nodebb.org/) - Forum software built for the modern web. ([Demo](https://try.nodebb.org/), [Source Code (⭐15k)](https://github.com/NodeBB/NodeBB)) `GPL-3.0` `Nodejs/Docker`
*   [OSSN](https://www.opensource-socialnetwork.org/) - Social networking software that allows you to make a social networking website and helps your members build social relationships, with people who share similar professional or personal interests. ([Source Code (⭐1.1k)](https://github.com/opensource-socialnetwork/opensource-socialnetwork)) `CAL-1.0` `PHP`

### Software / Communication - Video Conferencing

*   [Jitsi Meet](https://jitsi.org/Projects/JitsiMeet) - WebRTC application that uses Jitsi Videobridge to provide high quality, scalable video conferences. ([Demo](https://meet.jit.si), [Source Code (⭐26k)](https://github.com/jitsi/jitsi-meet)) `Apache-2.0` `Nodejs/Docker/deb`

### Software / Conference Management

*   [OpenSlides](https://openslides.com/) - Presentation and assembly system for managing and projecting agenda, motions and elections of an assembly. ([Demo](https://demo.os4.openslides.com/login), [Source Code (⭐553)](https://github.com/OpenSlides/OpenSlides)) `MIT` `Docker`

### Software / Content Management Systems (CMS)

*   [KeystoneJS](https://keystonejs.com/) - CMS and web application platform. ([Source Code (⭐9.6k)](https://github.com/keystonejs/keystone)) `MIT` `Nodejs`
*   [Noosfero](https://gitlab.com/noosfero/noosfero) - Platform for social and solidarity economy networks with blog, e-Portfolios, CMS, RSS, thematic discussion, events agenda and collective intelligence for solidarity economy in the same system. `AGPL-3.0` `Ruby`

### Software / Database Management

*   [Limbas](https://www.limbas.com/en/) - Database framework for creating database-driven business applications. As a graphical database frontend, it enables the efficient processing of data stocks and the flexible development of comfortable database applications. ([Source Code (⭐55)](https://github.com/limbas/limbas)) `GPL-2.0` `PHP`
*   [NocoDB](https://www.nocodb.com/) - No-code platform that turns any database into a smart spreadsheet (alternative to Airtable or Smartsheet). ([Source Code (⭐56k)](https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb)) `AGPL-3.0` `Nodejs/Docker`

### Software / Document Management

*   [OpenSign](https://www.opensignlabs.com) `⚠` - Document signing software (alternative to DocuSign). ([Source Code (⭐4.8k)](https://github.com/opensignlabs/opensign)) `AGPL-3.0` `Nodejs/Docker`

### Software / Document Management - E-books

*   [kiwix-serve](https://www.kiwix.org/en/downloads/kiwix-serve/) - HTTP daemon for serving wikis from ZIM files. ([Source Code (⭐590)](https://github.com/kiwix/kiwix-tools)) `GPL-3.0` `C++`

### Software / E-commerce

*   [OpenCart](https://www.opencart.com) - Shopping cart solution. ([Source Code (⭐7.8k)](https://github.com/opencart/opencart)) `GPL-3.0` `PHP`

### Software / Feed Readers

*   [NewsBlur](https://www.newsblur.com/) - Personal news reader that brings people together to talk about the world. A new sound of an old instrument. ([Source Code (⭐7.1k)](https://github.com/samuelclay/NewsBlur)) `MIT` `Python`
*   [Newspipe](https://git.sr.ht/~cedric/newspipe) - Web news reader. ([Demo](https://www.newspipe.org/signup)) `AGPL-3.0` `Python`

### Software / File Transfer & Synchronization

*   [Kinto](https://kinto.readthedocs.org) - Minimalist JSON storage service with synchronisation and sharing abilities. ([Source Code (⭐4.4k)](https://github.com/Kinto/kinto)) `Apache-2.0` `Python`

### Software / File Transfer - Single-click & Drag-n-drop Upload

*   [OnionShare (⭐6.6k)](https://github.com/onionshare/onionshare) - Securely and anonymously share a file of any size. `GPL-3.0` `Python/deb`

### Software / Games

*   [Lila](https://lichess.org/) - Ad-less chess server powering lichess.org, with official iOS and Android client apps. ([Source Code (⭐17k)](https://github.com/lichess-org/lila)) `AGPL-3.0` `Scala`
*   [Luanti](https://www.luanti.org/) - Voxel game engine (formerly Minetest). Play one of our many games, mod a game to your liking, make your own game, or play on a multiplayer server. ([Source Code (⭐12k)](https://github.com/luanti-org/luanti)) `LGPL-2.1/MIT/Zlib` `C++/Lua/deb`
*   [OpenTTD](https://www.openttd.org/) - Transport tycoon simulation game. ([Source Code (⭐7k)](https://github.com/OpenTTD/OpenTTD), [Clients](https://bananas.openttd.org/)) `GPL-2.0` `C++/Docker`

### Software / Games - Administrative Utilities & Control Panels

*   [Lodestone (⭐964)](https://github.com/Lodestone-Team/lodestone) - Server hosting tool for Minecraft and other multiplayers. `AGPL-3.0` `Docker/Rust`

### Software / Generative Artificial Intelligence (GenAI)

*   [IOPaint](https://www.iopaint.com/) `⚠` - Image inpainting tool powered by SOTA AI Model. ([Source Code (⭐22k)](https://github.com/Sanster/IOPaint)) `Apache-2.0` `Python/Docker`

### Software / Groupware

*   [Openmeetings](https://openmeetings.apache.org/index.html) - Video conferencing, instant messaging, whiteboard, collaborative document editing and other groupware tools using API functions of the Red5 Streaming Server for Remoting and Streaming. ([Source Code (⭐656)](https://github.com/apache/openmeetings)) `Apache-2.0` `Java`

### Software / Human Resources Management (HRM)

*   [OrangeHRM](https://www.orangehrm.com/) - Comprehensive HRM system that captures all the essential functionalities required for any enterprise. ([Demo](https://opensource-demo.orangehrmlive.com/), [Source Code (⭐933)](https://github.com/orangehrm/orangehrm)) `GPL-2.0` `PHP`

### Software / Internet of Things (IoT)

*   [LHA (⭐8)](https://github.com/javalikescript/lha) - Light Home Automation application that is fully extensible using Blockly, HTML or Lua. It includes extensions such as ConBee, Philips Hue or Z-Wave JS. `MIT` `Lua`
*   [OpenRemote](https://openremote.io) - IoT Asset management, Flow Rules and WHEN-THEN rules, Data visualization, Edge Gateway. ([Demo](https://demo.openremote.io/), [Source Code (⭐1.5k)](https://github.com/openremote/openremote)) `AGPL-3.0` `Java`

### Software / Knowledge Management Tools

*   [LibreKB](https://librekb.com/) - Web-based knowledge base solution. A simple web app, it runs on pretty much any web server or hosting provider with PHP and MySQL. ([Source Code (⭐42)](https://github.com/michaelstaake/LibreKB/)) `GPL-3.0` `PHP`

### Software / Learning and Courses

*   [OpenOLAT](https://www.openolat.com/?lang=en) - Learning management system for teaching, education, assessment and communication. ([Demo](https://learn.olat.com), [Source Code (⭐372)](https://github.com/OpenOLAT/OpenOLAT)) `Apache-2.0` `Java`

### Software / Manufacturing

*   [Octoprint](https://octoprint.org/) - Snappy web interface for controlling consumer 3D printers. ([Source Code (⭐8.6k)](https://github.com/OctoPrint/OctoPrint)) `AGPL-3.0` `Docker/Python`

### Software / Maps and Global Positioning System (GPS)

*   [OpenRouteService](https://openrouteservice.org/) - Route service with directions, isochrones, time-distance matrix, route optimization, etc. ([Demo](https://openrouteservice.org/dev/#/api-docs/introduction), [Source Code (⭐1.6k)](https://github.com/GIScience/openrouteservice)) `GPL-3.0` `Docker/Java`

### Software / Media Management

*   [Lidarr](https://lidarr.audio/) - Music collection manager for Usenet and BitTorrent users. ([Source Code (⭐4.3k)](https://github.com/Lidarr/Lidarr)) `GPL-3.0` `C#/Docker`
*   [nefarious](https://lardbit.github.io/nefarious/) - Automate downloading Movies and TV Shows. ([Source Code (⭐1.1k)](https://github.com/lardbit/nefarious)) `GPL-3.0` `Python`
*   [Ombi](https://ombi.io/) - Content request system for Plex/Emby, connects to SickRage, CouchPotato, Sonarr, with a growing feature set. ([Demo](https://app.ombi.io/), [Source Code (⭐3.9k)](https://github.com/Ombi-app/Ombi)) `GPL-2.0` `C#/deb`
*   [Overseerr](https://overseerr.dev/) `⚠` - Manage requests for your media library. It integrates with your existing services, such as Sonarr, Radarr, and Plex!. ([Source Code (⭐4.6k)](https://github.com/sct/overseerr)) `MIT` `Docker`

### Software / Media Streaming - Audio Streaming

*   [LibreTime](https://libretime.org) - Broadcast streaming radio on the web (fork of [Airtime (⭐623)](https://github.com/sourcefabric/Airtime)). ([Source Code (⭐869)](https://github.com/LibreTime/libretime)) `AGPL-3.0` `Docker/PHP`

### Software / Media Streaming - Video Streaming

*   [OvenMediaEngine (⭐2.8k)](https://github.com/AirenSoft/OvenMediaEngine) - Streaming Server with Sub-Second Latency. ([Demo](https://demo.ovenplayer.com)) `AGPL-3.0` `C++/Docker`

### Software / Miscellaneous

*   [Jelu](https://bayang.github.io/jelu-web) - Read and to-read list book tracker. ([Source Code (⭐519)](https://github.com/bayang/jelu)) `MIT` `Java/Docker`
*   [Libre Translate](https://libretranslate.com/) - Machine Translation API. ([Source Code (⭐12k)](https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate)) `AGPL-3.0` `Docker/Python`
*   [LubeLogger](https://lubelogger.com) - Web-based vehicle maintenance and fuel mileage tracker. ([Demo (⭐1.6k)](https://github.com/hargata/lubelog?tab=readme-ov-file#demo), [Source Code (⭐1.6k)](https://github.com/hargata/lubelog)) `MIT` `Docker/K8S/C#`
*   [Neko](https://neko.m1k1o.net) - Virtual browser that runs in docker and uses WebRTC. ([Source Code (⭐12k)](https://github.com/m1k1o/neko)) `Apache-2.0` `Docker/Go`
*   [Open-Meteo](https://open-meteo.com/) - Weather API with open-data forecasts, historical and climate data from all major national weather services. ([Demo](https://open-meteo.com/en/docs), [Source Code (⭐3.4k)](https://github.com/open-meteo/open-meteo)) `AGPL-3.0` `Docker`
*   [OpenZiti](https://openziti.github.io/) - Fully-featured, zero trust, full mesh overlay network. Includes a 2FA support out of the box, clients for all major desktop/mobile OS'es. ([Source Code (⭐3.4k)](https://github.com/openziti/ziti)) `Apache-2.0` `Go`

### Software / Money, Budgeting & Management

*   [Kill Bill](https://killbill.io/) - Subscription billing & payments platform. Have access to real-time analytics and financial reports. ([Source Code (⭐4.9k)](https://github.com/killbill/killbill)) `Apache-2.0` `Java/Docker`
*   [Kresus](https://kresus.org/) - Personal finance manager. ([Demo](https://kresus.org/en/demo.html), [Source Code (⭐317)](https://github.com/kresusapp/kresus)) `AGPL-3.0` `Nodejs/Docker`
*   [Lago](https://www.getlago.com/) - Metering and usage-based billing. ([Source Code (⭐7.9k)](https://github.com/getlago/lago)) `AGPL-3.0` `Docker`
*   [OctoBot](https://www.octobot.cloud/) - Cryptocurrency trading bot. ([Source Code (⭐4.2k)](https://github.com/Drakkar-Software/OctoBot)) `GPL-3.0` `Python/Docker`
*   [Ocular](https://simonwep.github.io/ocular/) - Simplistic and straightforward budgeting app to track your budget across months and years. ([Demo](https://ocular.reinisch.io/#demo), [Source Code (⭐235)](https://github.com/simonwep/ocular)) `MIT` `Docker`
*   [OpenBudgeteer (⭐866)](https://github.com/TheAxelander/OpenBudgeteer) - Budgeting app based on the Bucket Budgeting Principle. `AGPL-3.0` `Docker/C#`

### Software / Note-taking & Editors

*   [Joplin](https://joplinapp.org/) - Note taking application with markdown editor and encryption support for mobile and desktop platforms. Runs client-side and syncs through a self hosted Nextcloud instance or similar (alternative to Evernote). ([Source Code (⭐50k)](https://github.com/laurent22/joplin)) `MIT` `Nodejs`
*   [Note Mark](https://notemark.docs.enchantedcode.co.uk/) - Minimal web-based Markdown notes app. ([Source Code (⭐524)](https://github.com/enchant97/note-mark)) `AGPL-3.0` `Docker`
*   [Oddmuse](https://oddmuse.org/) - Simple wiki engine written in Perl. No database required. ([Source Code (⭐85)](https://github.com/kensanata/oddmuse)) `GPL-3.0` `Perl`

### Software / Pastebins

*   [Opengist (⭐2.5k)](https://github.com/thomiceli/opengist) - Pastebin powered by Git. ([Demo](https://demo.opengist.io)) `AGPL-3.0` `Docker/Go/Nodejs`
*   [paaster](https://paaster.io) - End-to-end encrypted pastebin built with the objective of simplicity. ([Source Code (⭐482)](https://github.com/WardPearce/paaster)) `AGPL-3.0` `Docker`

### Software / Personal Dashboards

*   [LittleLink](https://littlelink.io/) - Simplistic approach for links in bio with 100+ branded buttons (alternative to Linktree). ([Demo](https://littlelink.io/), [Source Code (⭐2.3k)](https://github.com/sethcottle/littlelink)) `MIT` `Javascript`

### Software / Photo Galleries

*   [LibrePhotos (⭐7.4k)](https://github.com/LibrePhotos/librephotos) - Photo management service with a slight focus on cool graphs (alternative to Google Photos). ([Clients](https://docs.librephotos.com/docs/user-guide/mobile/)) `MIT` `Python/Docker`
*   [Lychee](https://lycheeorg.github.io/) - Grid and album based photo-management-system. ([Source Code (⭐3.8k)](https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee)) `MIT` `PHP/Docker`

### Software / Polls and Events

*   [LimeSurvey](https://www.limesurvey.org) - Feature-rich web-based polling software. Supports extensive survey logic. ([Demo](https://demo.limesurvey.org), [Source Code (⭐3.2k)](https://github.com/LimeSurvey/LimeSurvey)) `GPL-2.0` `PHP`

### Software / Recipe Management

*   [KitchenOwl](https://docs.kitchenowl.org/latest/) - Cross-platform shopping list, recipe storage, expense tracker, and meal planner following the material design language. ([Source Code (⭐1.9k)](https://github.com/TomBursch/kitchenowl)) `AGPL-3.0` `Docker/deb`

### Software / Search Engines

*   [OpenSearch](https://opensearch.org) - Distributed and RESTful search engine. ([Source Code (⭐11k)](https://github.com/opensearch-project/OpenSearch)) `Apache-2.0` `Java/Docker/K8S/deb`

### Software / Self-hosting Solutions

*   [OpenMediaVault](https://www.openmediavault.org/) - Network attached storage (NAS) solution based on Debian Linux. It contains services like SSH, (S)FTP, SMB/CIFS, DAAP media server, RSync, BitTorrent client and many more. ([Source Code (⭐5.8k)](https://github.com/openmediavault/openmediavault)) `GPL-3.0` `PHP`

### Software / Software Development - API Management

*   [Kong](https://konghq.com/kong/) - Microservice API Gateway and Platform. ([Source Code (⭐41k)](https://github.com/Kong/kong)) `Apache-2.0` `Lua/Docker/K8S/deb`
*   [Lura](https://luraproject.org/) - High-performance API Gateway. ([Source Code (⭐6.6k)](https://github.com/luraproject/lura)) `Apache-2.0` `Go`

### Software / Software Development - IDE & Tools

*   [Judge0 CE](https://judge0.com) - API to compile and run source code. ([Source Code (⭐3.3k)](https://github.com/judge0/judge0)) `GPL-3.0` `Docker`
*   [LiveCodes](https://livecodes.io/docs/features/self-hosting) `⚠` - Feature-rich client-side code playground for React, Vue, Svelte, Solid, Typescript, Python, Go, Ruby, PHP and 90+ other languages. ([Demo](https://livecodes.io), [Source Code (⭐1.1k)](https://github.com/live-codes/livecodes)) `MIT` `Nodejs`

### Software / Software Development - Project Management

*   [Leantime](https://leantime.io) - Lean project management system for small teams and startups helping to manage projects from ideation through delivery. ([Source Code (⭐5.5k)](https://github.com/leantime/leantime)) `AGPL-3.0` `PHP/Docker`
*   [OpenProject](https://www.openproject.org) - Manage your projects, tasks and goals. Collaborate via work packages and link them to your pull requests on Github. ([Source Code (⭐11k)](https://github.com/opf/openproject)) `GPL-3.0` `Ruby/deb/Docker`

### Software / Task Management & To-do Lists

*   [Kanboard](https://kanboard.org/) - Simple visual task board. ([Source Code (⭐9k)](https://github.com/kanboard/kanboard)) `MIT` `PHP`
*   [Nullboard (⭐4k)](https://github.com/apankrat/nullboard) - Single-page minimalist kanban board; compact, highly readable and quick to use. ([Demo](https://nullboard.io/preview)) `BSD-2-Clause` `Javascript`
*   [Our Shopping List (⭐132)](https://github.com/nanawel/our-shopping-list) - Simple shared list application including shopping lists and any other small todo-list that needs to be used collaboratively. ([Demo](https://osl.lanterne-rouge.info/)) `AGPL-3.0` `Docker`

### Software / Ticketing

*   [OTOBO](https://otobo.io/en/) - Flexible web-based ticketing system used for customer service, help desk, IT service management. ([Demo](https://otobo.io/en/service-management-plattform/otobo-demo/), [Source Code (⭐295)](https://github.com/RotherOSS/otobo)) `GPL-3.0` `Perl/Docker`

### Software / Time Tracking

*   [Kimai](https://www.kimai.org/) - Track work time and print out a summary of your activities on demand. ([Demo](https://www.kimai.org/demo/), [Source Code (⭐3.9k)](https://github.com/kimai/kimai)) `AGPL-3.0` `PHP`

### Software / URL Shorteners

*   [Kutt](https://kutt.it) - Modern URL shortener with support for custom domains and custom URLs. ([Demo](https://kutt.it), [Source Code (⭐9.9k)](https://github.com/thedevs-network/kutt)) `MIT` `Nodejs/Docker`
*   [liteshort](https://ls.ikl.sh/) - User-friendly, actually lightweight, and configurable URL shortener. ([Source Code](https://git.ikl.sh/132ikl/liteshort)) `MIT` `Python/deb`

### Software / Web Servers

*   [Nginx Proxy Manager](https://nginxproxymanager.com/) - Docker container for managing Nginx proxy hosts with a simple, powerful interface. ([Source Code (⭐27k)](https://github.com/NginxProxyManager/nginx-proxy-manager)) `MIT` `Docker`

### Software / Wikis

*   [Otter Wiki](https://otterwiki.com/) - Simple, easy to use wiki software using markdown. ([Source Code (⭐943)](https://github.com/redimp/otterwiki)) `MIT` `Docker`

### List of Licenses / Wikis

*   `CAL-1.0` - [Cryptographic Autonomy License 1.0](https://spdx.org/licenses/CAL-1.0.html)
items.content_html:
Software / Archiving and Digital Preservation (DP)

  • LiveStreamDVR (⭐400) ⚠ - Automatic Twitch recorder capable of capturing live streams, chat messages and stream metadata. MIT Python/Nodejs/Docker

Software / Automation

  • LazyLibrarian ⚠ - Follow authors and grab metadata for all your digital reading needs. It uses a combination of Goodreads, Librarything and optionally GoogleBooks as sources for author info and book info. GPL-3.0 Python
  • Leon - Personal assistant who can live on your server. (Source Code (⭐16k)) MIT Nodejs
  • OliveTin - Web interface for running Linux shell commands. (Source Code (⭐3.1k)) AGPL-3.0 Go

Software / Blogging Platforms

  • Known - Collaborative social publishing platform. (Source Code (⭐1.1k)) Apache-2.0 PHP

Software / Bookmarks and Link Sharing

  • LinkAce - Bookmark archive with automatic backups to the Internet Archive, link monitoring, and a full REST API. Installation is done via Docker, or as a simple PHP application. (Demo, Source Code (⭐3k)) GPL-3.0 Docker/PHP
  • linkding - Minimal bookmark management with a fast and clean UI. Simple installation through Docker and can run on your Raspberry Pi. (Demo, Source Code (⭐8.6k)) MIT Docker
  • LinkWarden - Bookmark and archive manager to store your useful links. (Source Code (⭐13k)) MIT Docker/Nodejs
  • NeonLink (⭐356) - Bookmark service with unique design and simple installation with Docker. MIT Docker

Software / Communication - Custom Communication Systems

  • Jami - Universal communication platform which preserves the user's privacy and freedoms. (Source Code) GPL-3.0 C++
  • Novu - Notification infrastructure for developers. (Source Code (⭐37k)) MIT Docker/Nodejs

Software / Communication - Email - Mailing Lists and Newsletters

  • Keila - Reliable and easy-to-use newsletter tool (alternative to Mailchimp or Sendinblue). (Demo, Source Code (⭐1.7k)) AGPL-3.0 Docker

Software / Communication - IRC

  • ngircd - Portable and lightweight Internet Relay Chat server for small or private networks. (Source Code (⭐484)) GPL-2.0 C/deb

Software / Communication - SIP

  • openSIPS - SIP proxy/server for voice, video, IM, presence and any other SIP extensions. (Source Code (⭐1.4k)) GPL-2.0 C

Software / Communication - Social Networks and Forums

  • Lemmy - Link aggregator for the fediverse (alternative to Reddit). (Source Code (⭐14k)) AGPL-3.0 Docker/Rust
  • Loomio - Collaborative decision-making tool that makes it easy for anyone to participate in decisions which affect them. (Source Code (⭐2.5k)) AGPL-3.0 Docker
  • NodeBB - Forum software built for the modern web. (Demo, Source Code (⭐15k)) GPL-3.0 Nodejs/Docker
  • OSSN - Social networking software that allows you to make a social networking website and helps your members build social relationships, with people who share similar professional or personal interests. (Source Code (⭐1.1k)) CAL-1.0 PHP

Software / Communication - Video Conferencing

  • Jitsi Meet - WebRTC application that uses Jitsi Videobridge to provide high quality, scalable video conferences. (Demo, Source Code (⭐26k)) Apache-2.0 Nodejs/Docker/deb

Software / Conference Management

  • OpenSlides - Presentation and assembly system for managing and projecting agenda, motions and elections of an assembly. (Demo, Source Code (⭐553)) MIT Docker

Software / Content Management Systems (CMS)

  • KeystoneJS - CMS and web application platform. (Source Code (⭐9.6k)) MIT Nodejs
  • Noosfero - Platform for social and solidarity economy networks with blog, e-Portfolios, CMS, RSS, thematic discussion, events agenda and collective intelligence for solidarity economy in the same system. AGPL-3.0 Ruby

Software / Database Management

  • Limbas - Database framework for creating database-driven business applications. As a graphical database frontend, it enables the efficient processing of data stocks and the flexible development of comfortable database applications. (Source Code (⭐55)) GPL-2.0 PHP
  • NocoDB - No-code platform that turns any database into a smart spreadsheet (alternative to Airtable or Smartsheet). (Source Code (⭐56k)) AGPL-3.0 Nodejs/Docker

Software / Document Management

  • OpenSign ⚠ - Document signing software (alternative to DocuSign). (Source Code (⭐4.8k)) AGPL-3.0 Nodejs/Docker

Software / Document Management - E-books

  • kiwix-serve - HTTP daemon for serving wikis from ZIM files. (Source Code (⭐590)) GPL-3.0 C++

Software / E-commerce

  • OpenCart - Shopping cart solution. (Source Code (⭐7.8k)) GPL-3.0 PHP

Software / Feed Readers

  • NewsBlur - Personal news reader that brings people together to talk about the world. A new sound of an old instrument. (Source Code (⭐7.1k)) MIT Python
  • Newspipe - Web news reader. (Demo) AGPL-3.0 Python

Software / File Transfer & Synchronization

  • Kinto - Minimalist JSON storage service with synchronisation and sharing abilities. (Source Code (⭐4.4k)) Apache-2.0 Python

Software / File Transfer - Single-click & Drag-n-drop Upload

  • OnionShare (⭐6.6k) - Securely and anonymously share a file of any size. GPL-3.0 Python/deb

Software / Games

  • Lila - Ad-less chess server powering lichess.org, with official iOS and Android client apps. (Source Code (⭐17k)) AGPL-3.0 Scala
  • Luanti - Voxel game engine (formerly Minetest). Play one of our many games, mod a game to your liking, make your own game, or play on a multiplayer server. (Source Code (⭐12k)) LGPL-2.1/MIT/Zlib C++/Lua/deb
  • OpenTTD - Transport tycoon simulation game. (Source Code (⭐7k), Clients) GPL-2.0 C++/Docker

Software / Games - Administrative Utilities & Control Panels

  • Lodestone (⭐964) - Server hosting tool for Minecraft and other multiplayers. AGPL-3.0 Docker/Rust

Software / Generative Artificial Intelligence (GenAI)

  • IOPaint ⚠ - Image inpainting tool powered by SOTA AI Model. (Source Code (⭐22k)) Apache-2.0 Python/Docker

Software / Groupware

  • Openmeetings - Video conferencing, instant messaging, whiteboard, collaborative document editing and other groupware tools using API functions of the Red5 Streaming Server for Remoting and Streaming. (Source Code (⭐656)) Apache-2.0 Java

Software / Human Resources Management (HRM)

  • OrangeHRM - Comprehensive HRM system that captures all the essential functionalities required for any enterprise. (Demo, Source Code (⭐933)) GPL-2.0 PHP

Software / Internet of Things (IoT)

  • LHA (⭐8) - Light Home Automation application that is fully extensible using Blockly, HTML or Lua. It includes extensions such as ConBee, Philips Hue or Z-Wave JS. MIT Lua
  • OpenRemote - IoT Asset management, Flow Rules and WHEN-THEN rules, Data visualization, Edge Gateway. (Demo, Source Code (⭐1.5k)) AGPL-3.0 Java

Software / Knowledge Management Tools

  • LibreKB - Web-based knowledge base solution. A simple web app, it runs on pretty much any web server or hosting provider with PHP and MySQL. (Source Code (⭐42)) GPL-3.0 PHP

Software / Learning and Courses

  • OpenOLAT - Learning management system for teaching, education, assessment and communication. (Demo, Source Code (⭐372)) Apache-2.0 Java

Software / Manufacturing

  • Octoprint - Snappy web interface for controlling consumer 3D printers. (Source Code (⭐8.6k)) AGPL-3.0 Docker/Python

Software / Maps and Global Positioning System (GPS)

  • OpenRouteService - Route service with directions, isochrones, time-distance matrix, route optimization, etc. (Demo, Source Code (⭐1.6k)) GPL-3.0 Docker/Java

Software / Media Management

  • Lidarr - Music collection manager for Usenet and BitTorrent users. (Source Code (⭐4.3k)) GPL-3.0 C#/Docker
  • nefarious - Automate downloading Movies and TV Shows. (Source Code (⭐1.1k)) GPL-3.0 Python
  • Ombi - Content request system for Plex/Emby, connects to SickRage, CouchPotato, Sonarr, with a growing feature set. (Demo, Source Code (⭐3.9k)) GPL-2.0 C#/deb
  • Overseerr ⚠ - Manage requests for your media library. It integrates with your existing services, such as Sonarr, Radarr, and Plex!. (Source Code (⭐4.6k)) MIT Docker

Software / Media Streaming - Audio Streaming

  • LibreTime - Broadcast streaming radio on the web (fork of Airtime (⭐623)). (Source Code (⭐869)) AGPL-3.0 Docker/PHP

Software / Media Streaming - Video Streaming

  • OvenMediaEngine (⭐2.8k) - Streaming Server with Sub-Second Latency. (Demo) AGPL-3.0 C++/Docker

Software / Miscellaneous

  • Jelu - Read and to-read list book tracker. (Source Code (⭐519)) MIT Java/Docker
  • Libre Translate - Machine Translation API. (Source Code (⭐12k)) AGPL-3.0 Docker/Python
  • LubeLogger - Web-based vehicle maintenance and fuel mileage tracker. (Demo (⭐1.6k), Source Code (⭐1.6k)) MIT Docker/K8S/C#
  • Neko - Virtual browser that runs in docker and uses WebRTC. (Source Code (⭐12k)) Apache-2.0 Docker/Go
  • Open-Meteo - Weather API with open-data forecasts, historical and climate data from all major national weather services. (Demo, Source Code (⭐3.4k)) AGPL-3.0 Docker
  • OpenZiti - Fully-featured, zero trust, full mesh overlay network. Includes a 2FA support out of the box, clients for all major desktop/mobile OS'es. (Source Code (⭐3.4k)) Apache-2.0 Go

Software / Money, Budgeting & Management

  • Kill Bill - Subscription billing & payments platform. Have access to real-time analytics and financial reports. (Source Code (⭐4.9k)) Apache-2.0 Java/Docker
  • Kresus - Personal finance manager. (Demo, Source Code (⭐317)) AGPL-3.0 Nodejs/Docker
  • Lago - Metering and usage-based billing. (Source Code (⭐7.9k)) AGPL-3.0 Docker
  • OctoBot - Cryptocurrency trading bot. (Source Code (⭐4.2k)) GPL-3.0 Python/Docker
  • Ocular - Simplistic and straightforward budgeting app to track your budget across months and years. (Demo, Source Code (⭐235)) MIT Docker
  • OpenBudgeteer (⭐866) - Budgeting app based on the Bucket Budgeting Principle. AGPL-3.0 Docker/C#

Software / Note-taking & Editors

  • Joplin - Note taking application with markdown editor and encryption support for mobile and desktop platforms. Runs client-side and syncs through a self hosted Nextcloud instance or similar (alternative to Evernote). (Source Code (⭐50k)) MIT Nodejs
  • Note Mark - Minimal web-based Markdown notes app. (Source Code (⭐524)) AGPL-3.0 Docker
  • Oddmuse - Simple wiki engine written in Perl. No database required. (Source Code (⭐85)) GPL-3.0 Perl

Software / Pastebins

  • Opengist (⭐2.5k) - Pastebin powered by Git. (Demo) AGPL-3.0 Docker/Go/Nodejs
  • paaster - End-to-end encrypted pastebin built with the objective of simplicity. (Source Code (⭐482)) AGPL-3.0 Docker

Software / Personal Dashboards

  • LittleLink - Simplistic approach for links in bio with 100+ branded buttons (alternative to Linktree). (Demo, Source Code (⭐2.3k)) MIT Javascript

Software / Photo Galleries

  • LibrePhotos (⭐7.4k) - Photo management service with a slight focus on cool graphs (alternative to Google Photos). (Clients) MIT Python/Docker
  • Lychee - Grid and album based photo-management-system. (Source Code (⭐3.8k)) MIT PHP/Docker

Software / Polls and Events

  • LimeSurvey - Feature-rich web-based polling software. Supports extensive survey logic. (Demo, Source Code (⭐3.2k)) GPL-2.0 PHP

Software / Recipe Management

  • KitchenOwl - Cross-platform shopping list, recipe storage, expense tracker, and meal planner following the material design language. (Source Code (⭐1.9k)) AGPL-3.0 Docker/deb

Software / Search Engines

  • OpenSearch - Distributed and RESTful search engine. (Source Code (⭐11k)) Apache-2.0 Java/Docker/K8S/deb

Software / Self-hosting Solutions

  • OpenMediaVault - Network attached storage (NAS) solution based on Debian Linux. It contains services like SSH, (S)FTP, SMB/CIFS, DAAP media server, RSync, BitTorrent client and many more. (Source Code (⭐5.8k)) GPL-3.0 PHP

Software / Software Development - API Management

  • Kong - Microservice API Gateway and Platform. (Source Code (⭐41k)) Apache-2.0 Lua/Docker/K8S/deb
  • Lura - High-performance API Gateway. (Source Code (⭐6.6k)) Apache-2.0 Go

Software / Software Development - IDE & Tools

  • Judge0 CE - API to compile and run source code. (Source Code (⭐3.3k)) GPL-3.0 Docker
  • LiveCodes ⚠ - Feature-rich client-side code playground for React, Vue, Svelte, Solid, Typescript, Python, Go, Ruby, PHP and 90+ other languages. (Demo, Source Code (⭐1.1k)) MIT Nodejs

Software / Software Development - Project Management

  • Leantime - Lean project management system for small teams and startups helping to manage projects from ideation through delivery. (Source Code (⭐5.5k)) AGPL-3.0 PHP/Docker
  • OpenProject - Manage your projects, tasks and goals. Collaborate via work packages and link them to your pull requests on Github. (Source Code (⭐11k)) GPL-3.0 Ruby/deb/Docker

Software / Task Management & To-do Lists

  • Kanboard - Simple visual task board. (Source Code (⭐9k)) MIT PHP
  • Nullboard (⭐4k) - Single-page minimalist kanban board; compact, highly readable and quick to use. (Demo) BSD-2-Clause Javascript
  • Our Shopping List (⭐132) - Simple shared list application including shopping lists and any other small todo-list that needs to be used collaboratively. (Demo) AGPL-3.0 Docker

Software / Ticketing

  • OTOBO - Flexible web-based ticketing system used for customer service, help desk, IT service management. (Demo, Source Code (⭐295)) GPL-3.0 Perl/Docker

Software / Time Tracking

  • Kimai - Track work time and print out a summary of your activities on demand. (Demo, Source Code (⭐3.9k)) AGPL-3.0 PHP

Software / URL Shorteners

  • Kutt - Modern URL shortener with support for custom domains and custom URLs. (Demo, Source Code (⭐9.9k)) MIT Nodejs/Docker
  • liteshort - User-friendly, actually lightweight, and configurable URL shortener. (Source Code) MIT Python/deb

Software / Web Servers

  • Nginx Proxy Manager - Docker container for managing Nginx proxy hosts with a simple, powerful interface. (Source Code (⭐27k)) MIT Docker

Software / Wikis

  • Otter Wiki - Simple, easy to use wiki software using markdown. (Source Code (⭐943)) MIT Docker

List of Licenses / Wikis

  • CAL-1.0 - Cryptographic Autonomy License 1.0

items.title: Awesome Deno
items.content_text:
### Docs / Official Docs

*   [Official Site](https://deno.com)
*   [Deno Manual](https://docs.deno.com)
*   [Deno API Reference](https://docs.deno.com/api)
*   [Deno Standard Library](https://jsr.io/@std)

### Modules / Database

*   [@iuioiua/redis](https://jsr.io/@iuioiua/redis) - Fast, lightweight Redis client built upon the Web Streams API.

### Integrations / XML

*   [Slack Custom Functions](https://api.slack.com/future/functions/custom) - Build custom Run On Slack functions using Deno.
*   [Smallweb](https://www.smallweb.run/) - A personal cloud contained in a single directory. You can customize the server behavior using Deno.

### Resources in Other Languages / Kurdish (Central)

*   [A short introduction to Deno](https://devs.krd/about-deno)

items.title: Awesome Cl
items.content_text:
### System administration / Third-party APIs

*   [Consfigurator](https://spwhitton.name/tech/code/consfigurator/) - Lisp declarative configuration management system.  You can use it to configure hosts as root, deploy services as unprivileged users, build and deploy containers, produce disc images, operate on files and directories and more. [GPL3](http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html).
    *   apache, apt, cmd, container, cron, disk, file, firewalld, git, hostname, lets-encrypt, locale, lxc, mount, network, os, package, periodic, postgres, reboot, service, ssh, sshd, systemd, timezone, user…

### Documentation builders / Third-party APIs

*   [adp (⭐4)](https://github.com/HectareaGalbis/adp) -  Common Lisp documentation generator using Scribble files. [MIT](https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT).
items.content_html:
System administration / Third-party APIs

  • Consfigurator - Lisp declarative configuration management system. You can use it to configure hosts as root, deploy services as unprivileged users, build and deploy containers, produce disc images, operate on files and directories and more. GPL3.
    • apache, apt, cmd, container, cron, disk, file, firewalld, git, hostname, lets-encrypt, locale, lxc, mount, network, os, package, periodic, postgres, reboot, service, ssh, sshd, systemd, timezone, user…

Documentation builders / Third-party APIs

  • adp (⭐4) - Common Lisp documentation generator using Scribble files. MIT.

[![Open-Source Software](https://jaywcjlove.github.io/sb/ico/min-oss.svg "Open Source Software") ![Freeware](https://jaywcjlove.github.io/sb/ico/min-free.svg "Freeware")](https://github.com/hoppscotch/hoppscotch)

items.title: Awesome Postgres
items.content_text:
### Contents / Backups

*   [pgbackweb (⭐1.7k)](https://github.com/eduardolat/pgbackweb) - A Complete Docker-based Postgres backup and maintenance tool with Web UI.

### Contents / Server

*   [Apache Cloudberry (⭐998)](https://github.com/apache/cloudberry) - And MPP PostgreSQL fork. Open source alternative to Greenplum Database.
*   [Postgres-XL](https://www.postgres-xl.org/) - Scalable Open Source PostgreSQL-based Database Cluster.

### Contents / Extensions

*   [pgcat (⭐385)](https://github.com/kingluo/pgcat) - Enhanced PostgreSQL logical replication

### Contents / Work Queues

*   [BeanQueue (⭐18)](https://github.com/LaunchPlatform/bq) - A Python work queue framework based on SKIP LOCKED, LISTEN and NOTIFY
*   [pgmq (⭐3.4k)](https://github.com/pgmq/pgmq) - A lightweight message queue. Like AWS SQS and RSMQ but on Postgres.
*   [river (⭐4.2k)](https://github.com/riverqueue/river) - A high-performance job processing system for Go and Postgres.

### Contents / Optimization

*   [aqo (⭐466)](https://github.com/postgrespro/aqo) - Adaptive query optimization for PostgreSQL.

### Contents / Utilities

*   [NServiceBus.Transport.PostgreSql (⭐43)](https://github.com/Particular/NServiceBus.SqlServer) - The NServiceBus.Transport.PostgreSql library allows .NET developers to [use a PostgreSQL database as a message broker](https://docs.particular.net/transports/postgresql). (Commerical Software)
*   [planter (⭐553)](https://github.com/achiku/planter) - Generate PlantUML ER diagram textual description from PostgreSQL tables
items.content_html:
Contents / Backups

  • pgbackweb (⭐1.7k) - A Complete Docker-based Postgres backup and maintenance tool with Web UI.

Contents / Server

  • Apache Cloudberry (⭐998) - And MPP PostgreSQL fork. Open source alternative to Greenplum Database.
  • Postgres-XL - Scalable Open Source PostgreSQL-based Database Cluster.

Contents / Extensions

  • pgcat (⭐385) - Enhanced PostgreSQL logical replication

Contents / Work Queues

  • BeanQueue (⭐18) - A Python work queue framework based on SKIP LOCKED, LISTEN and NOTIFY
  • pgmq (⭐3.4k) - A lightweight message queue. Like AWS SQS and RSMQ but on Postgres.
  • river (⭐4.2k) - A high-performance job processing system for Go and Postgres.

Contents / Optimization

  • aqo (⭐466) - Adaptive query optimization for PostgreSQL.

Contents / Utilities

  • NServiceBus.Transport.PostgreSql (⭐43) - The NServiceBus.Transport.PostgreSql library allows .NET developers to use a PostgreSQL database as a message broker. (Commerical Software)
  • planter (⭐553) - Generate PlantUML ER diagram textual description from PostgreSQL tables

items.title: Awesome Windows
items.content_text:
### IDEs

*   [Spyder](https://www.spyder-ide.org/) - Open-source Python IDE designed for scientific development and data analysis [![Open-Source Software](https://github.com/0PandaDEV/awesome-windows/raw/main/assets/opensource.svg)](https://github.com/spyder-ide/spyder)

### System Utilities

*   [scrcpy (⭐125k)](https://github.com/Genymobile/scrcpy) - Easily mirror and control your Android devices on computers via USB or WiFi. ![Open-Source Software](https://github.com/0PandaDEV/awesome-windows/raw/main/assets/opensource.svg)
items.content_html:
IDEs

  • Spyder - Open-source Python IDE designed for scientific development and data analysis

System Utilities

  • scrcpy (⭐125k) - Easily mirror and control your Android devices on computers via USB or WiFi.
